featured.text: Which is closest in meaning to the word “encroachment” in the last paragraph? (A) Invasion.
They have been used to mark the hours of the day, to call the 27 to prayer, and to signal emergency situations such as fires and invasions.

definition.zh_def: 入侵，指軍隊或其他力量進入一個國家或地區以佔領或控制。
definition.en_def: An invasion is an instance of invading a country or region with an armed force.
definition.example: The invasion of the country led to widespread chaos and destruction.
